mapper.insert: insert into medicalrecord (pId, rId, mChiefComplaint, mHistoryOfPresentIllness, mSituation, mHistoryOfPastIllness, mAllergy, mPhysicalExamination, mSuggestion, mAttention) values (#{pId}, #{rId}, #{mChiefComplaint}, #{mHistoryOfPresentIllness}, #{mSituation}, #{mHistoryOfPastIllness}, #{mAllergy}, #{mPhysicalExamination}, #{mSuggestion}, #{mAttention})
